column2: This is an emergency! Do you read me?
We have run out of fuel and life support ist starting to fail! You must help! Please!
Great. We are at <COORDS>. Just dock at our ship.
Great. We are at <COORDS>. Just dock at our ship. Please hurry!
All right, but for a price.
Yes I am. Consider yourself darwin award winners
You can't do this! We are all going to die!
We've run out of fuel.Life support is failing.  Please respond. Hello?
